author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Create your own stories with terrain from https://tabletopterrain.com/?ref=playon and get 5% if you use code: PLAYONTABLETOP Want amazing dice? https://baronofdice.com/?ref=PiWj5cSTlKyTsZ 

JT and Mubin take you through a 15-minute overview of Marvel Crisis Protocol followed by a demo game by Nick and Mubin. Nick at the time of shooting this episode was brand new to MCP. 

0:00 Intro
1:20 What You Need to Play
5:25 How to Read Character Stat Cards
7:35 Activations. What your Characters Can Do.
8:55 Example of an Activation
12:45 Phases
15:45 Demo Game

Get access to our Discord community by becoming a YouTube member and going into your Discord connection settings and enabling YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ4-WFTrDNWvcM7dEC6E2mw/join

title: How to Play Marvel Crisis Protocol with Demo Game
